name: Scooter Shootout
description:
Picture this: You just robbed a bank with your buddies, your home slices... but SUDDENLY, you get surround by the fuzz, and your friends are nowhere to be seen. (The audacity!) Survive against the police, and get the highest score that you can!

~~~~~~Controls~~~~~~

Keyboard:

Shoot / Continue: Spacebar

Move: WASD / Arrow Keys

Show Player Hitbox: Shift Key

PS4 Controller:

Shoot / Continue: Cross, Circle, Square, Triangle

Move: WASD / Left Joystick / D-Pad (D-Pad is recommended)

Show Player Hitbox: Left and Right Triggers

Xbox Controller:

Shoot / Continue: A, B, X, Y

Move: WASD / Left Joystick / D-Pad (D-Pad is recommended)

Show Player Hitbox: Left and Right Triggers

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Made over the course of 10 days for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022!
